com.daw.pms.Controller

Class MVController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.daw.pms.Controller.MVController

  • @RestController
 @CacheConfig(cacheNames="mv-cache")
 @Cacheable(key="#root.methodName + \'(\' + #root.args + \')\'",
           unless="!#result.success")
public class MVController
extends Object

    • Method Detail

      • getDetailMV

        @GetMapping(value="/mv/{vid}")
public Result getDetailMV(@PathVariable
                                                         String vid,
                                                         @RequestParam
                                                         int platform)
        Get detail video information according to its vid.
        Parameters:
        vid - The vid/mvid/mlogId of the mv.
        platform - The platform id.
        Returns:
        The detail information of the mv vid.
        API Note:
        GET /mv/vid?platform=platform

      • getMVsLink

        @GetMapping(value="/mvLink/{vids}")
public Result getMVsLink(@PathVariable
                                                             String vids,
                                                             @RequestParam
                                                             int platform)
        Deprecated. DON'T USE, NEED TO CONFORM THE RESULT.
        Get all MVs links.
        Parameters:
        vids - The vid of the mv(s), multi vid separated by comma.
        platform - The platform id.
        Returns:
        A map which key is the vid and value is a list of urls of this mv.
        API Note:
        GET /mvLink/vids?platform=platform

      • getRelatedVideos

        @GetMapping(value="/relatedMV/{songId}")
public Result getRelatedVideos(@PathVariable
                                                                        Long songId,
                                                                        @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                        String mvId,
                                                                        @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                        Integer limit,
                                                                        @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                        Integer songType,
                                                                        @RequestParam
                                                                        int platform)
        Get all related videos with the song.
        Parameters:
        songId - The song's id.
        mvId - The mv's id, only in ncm platform.
        limit - The limit of related videos, only in ncm platform.
        songType - The pms song's type, only used in pms platform.
        platform - The platform id.
        Returns:
        All the related video about the song with songId.
        API Note:
        GET /relatedMV/songId?mvId=mvId&limit=limit&platform=platform
